data.current_summary: Get subscription preferences for a specific contact

data.current_description: Set the subscription status of a specific contact.
data.description_suggestion: Updates the subscription status and communication preferences for a specific contact identified by subscriberIdString. Accepts a PartialPublicStatusRequest object to modify subscription settings for one or more communication channels. Returns the updated PublicStatus object reflecting all current subscription preferences. This operation modifies the contact's subscription state and may affect future communication delivery based on the updated preferences.
